hero.title: Welcome to RS Electrical Services
hero.text: At RS Electrical Services, we bring years of experience and a commitment to quality to every project. Whether it's a minor repair or a complete electrical overhaul, our dedicated team is here to deliver safe, reliable, and efficient solutions. Serving homes and businesses with a focus on excellence and customer satisfaction, we're your go-to choice for all electrical needs.

services.name: EV Charger Installation
services.description: Reliable, professional installation of electric vehicle charging points. Whether it's for home or business, we provide tailored EV charger installation solutions. Our certified electricians ensure that the process is safe and compliant with current standards, giving you peace of mind as you embrace electric vehicle technology.

services.name: Rewiring
services.description: Comprehensive rewiring services to upgrade and secure your electrical systems. Our team specializes in complete and partial rewiring for both residential and commercial properties. We ensure that your electrical infrastructure is modern, safe, and capable of handling today's energy demands, minimizing the risk of hazards.

services.name: New Build Electrical
services.description: Full electrical installations for new build properties, done right from the start. We work closely with builders, developers, and property owners to design and implement electrical systems that meet all safety standards. From lighting to power distribution, we provide efficient and reliable solutions for new constructions.

services.name: Fault Finding
services.description: Efficient electrical fault detection and repair. When electrical issues arise, timely intervention is crucial. Our expert electricians are equipped with the latest tools to quickly diagnose and resolve electrical faults, ensuring your property stays safe and operational with minimal downtime.

services.name: Electrical Testing
services.description: Comprehensive electrical inspections to ensure safety and compliance. We offer a range of electrical testing services, including periodic inspections, to ensure that your installations comply with current regulations. This helps identify potential risks and ensures that your systems are operating efficiently and safely.

services.name: Certification & Reports
services.description: Detailed electrical certification and reporting for compliance and safety. Whether you're selling a property or simply ensuring safety compliance, our certification and reporting services provide the documentation you need. We conduct thorough inspections and provide detailed reports that meet industry regulations.

services.name: CCTV
services.description: Secure your property with professional CCTV installation and monitoring. We offer bespoke CCTV solutions tailored to your security needs, whether it's for residential or commercial properties. Our systems provide high-quality footage, real-time monitoring, and are designed to deter intruders, helping you keep your property safe 24/7.

services.name: Fire Alarm Installation
services.description: Protect your property with reliable fire alarm systems. Our expert team designs and installs fire alarm systems that meet the highest safety standards. From detection to alarm response, we provide complete solutions for residential and commercial properties, ensuring rapid response to potential fire hazards.

services.name: Emergency Lighting
services.description: Stay safe during power outages with professional emergency lighting solutions. We install and maintain emergency lighting systems that activate when power is lost, ensuring safe evacuation routes during emergencies. Our solutions are compliant with safety regulations and tailored to your propertyâ€™s needs, providing you with peace of mind.

faqs.question: Are you fully qualified & insured to carry out all of the services listed?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are fully qualified and insured to carry out all the services listed. Our electricians are certified under UK regulations, including NICEIC and Part P, ensuring that all work is carried out to the highest safety standards. Additionally, we hold full public liability insurance, providing peace of mind for all our customers.

faqs.question: What should I do if my electrical system fails outside of regular hours?
faqs.answer: We provide 24/7 emergency electrical services. If you experience an electrical failure, especially one posing a safety risk, contact us immediately, and we will dispatch a technician as soon as possible.

faqs.question: How often should I have my electrical system inspected?
faqs.answer: It is recommended to have your electrical system inspected every 3-5 years, or sooner if you notice any issues. Regular inspections help ensure safety and can prevent potential hazards.

faqs.question: Are you qualified to install EV chargers?
faqs.answer: Yes, all of our electricians are fully certified to install EV charging points. We follow strict regulations to ensure that the installation is safe and compliant with industry standards.

faqs.question: Do you provide certifications after electrical testing?
faqs.answer: Yes, after completing electrical testing, we provide full certification that confirms your electrical system meets safety standards. This is particularly useful for landlords and commercial property owners.
